_description: English couplet translating common Latin colophon: ‘Nunc scripsi totum pro christo da michi potum’

Wellcome405.Transcription: Now haw y vryt alleȝyf me drynk of gode ale
Wellcome405.Note: Latin version precedes English translation in this MS.
Wellcome405.Editions:
Moorat,  S. A. J. 
             Catalogue of Western Manuscripts on Medicine and Science. Vol. 1
                Manuscripts Written before 1650 A.D.
         London: Historical Medical Library, 1962: 1.273.
